songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
'Twuzz the night before Christmas, nothin' but drama. I got in a fight with my baby mama. She yelled "Fuck you!", and she opened the door, threw something shiny and lathery out in the six feet snow. I got out my car and I started the sneeze, then I realized it was a Raider jacket with all 3 super bowls on the sleeves. I got so happy when I pulled that new jacket out the ditch, I ran back in the house and fucked the shit outta that bitch
songs.title: Twuzz the Night C4 Christmas
